content.question: If <math alttext="e raised to the y power, minus e raised to the y squared power, equals, x minus x cubed" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, then the value of <math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> at the point <math alttext="with coordinates 0 comma 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> is

choices.label: <math alttext="the negative of the fraction 1 over e" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator e minus 1, and denominator 2 e, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>e</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>e</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 1 plus 2 e, and denominator e" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the negative of the fraction 1 over e" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

unit.text: 3: Differentiation: Composite, Implicit, and Inverse Functions

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
